title: Yakusoku no Neverland 2nd Season (The Promised Neverland Season 2)
synopsis: Emma, Ray, and the rest of the older children have escaped the confines of the Grace Field House. However, with relentless demons set on capturing them, their arduous battle for freedom has only just begun.
